Rulings.Base:
1. This effect targets the 3 Equip Spell Cards.
2. If any of the targets are no longer in your GY when this card resolves, its effect disappears.
3. You return the Equip Spells to the Deck, then apply one of the listed effects.
4. You don't choose which effect to apply until this card resolves.
5. The effect to destroy 1 card does not target.
